update custom_return_history set CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECHARGE_BALANCE = #{rechargeBalance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REWARD = #{reward,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREDIT = #{credit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RETURN_PRICE = #{returnPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAY_MODE = #{payMode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
